li.label: changed
li.description: If I'm supposed to be a wolf, why is everything so scary? I feel like hiding all the time!

li.label: changed
li.description: These ears and this nose are amazing, and this body is the perfect blend of cute and ferocious!

li.label: changed
li.description: Everything is so loud and terrifying, and the smells are horrible!

li.label: changed
li.description: I can hear the slightest twitch of a rabbit and smell it from across a field! This is amazing, give me more of this!

li.label: reverted
li.description: Who would have thought a wolf could be so skittish? I'm glad to be back to my old self.

li.label: reverted
li.description: But I was so cute before! All these human senses feel so dull in comparison...

li.label: reverted
li.description: Those nasty smells are gone, and I'm no longer jumping in terror at the slightest noise. Oh body, how I missed you!

li.label: reverted
li.description: But... but... I was so close...

li.label: Wolf ears
li.description: These ears have a mind of their own! Their hearing ability is nice, but I wish they wouldn't give away my mood so easily...

li.label: Wolf ears
li.description: They're so big and sensitive! And they can swivel to catch the slightest sound!

li.label: Wolf ears
li.description: What was that sound?! I hate how it feels when these stupid things move, and the slightest noise makes my heart skip!

li.label: Wolf tail
li.description: With the way it keeps giving away my mood like that I guess I can say goodbye to winning at poker night.

li.label: Wolf tail
li.description: It's so cute and wags at the slightest thought! I love it, even if it's not as fluffy as other wolf tails.

li.label: Wolf tail
li.description: I can't even pretend to ignore this thing! It's been tucked between my legs since it grew in, making me look like a frightened dog.

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: I hope I can keep that growl out of my voice with more practice, but those weird smells are never going to go away...

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: I can smell everything with this! *sniff sniff* Oh, what's that?

li.label: Wolf muzzle
li.description: Rrrf, I can't talk right with this thing! No matter how I try, I sound too much like a damn animal!
